name: Rabbit Punk!
description:
This game are make for the ZenoJam, a small Jam of 2 days, that the theme is now you see me, now you don´t. Because the theme i thinked: Why not put the major protagonist of a ilusion trick in a bad situation?

Rabbit punk! is a game about a guy in your garden with a new tenant, or maybe is a rabbit with a bad new human in your house? Its dosen´t matter. Both want the carrot and will fight for it.

I used the sprite of the Rabbit from HiroRedBird because pixelart is very hard to me, but i tryed to make everything else and used a free music named A  bit of hope.
